skillTree.localised_description: The unnatural speed and brutality of a reanimated Promethean makes it the ideal mount for any Undead, battle-mongering pirate.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is Undead (does not rout, immune to terror, becomes unstable when Leadership is low).

skillTree.localised_description: "It's a rabbit's foot. A rabbit. No… Oh never mind - it brings me luck. It does! Trust me!"
You'd better kill this one or they'll keep coming back until one of you is dead. Even then, there's no guarantee it'll be over!
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Send 'em to the Galleon's Graveyard.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +4% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for artillery units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Harkon's sorcery ensures that even the most sodden black powder will fire. Usually.
Not gills, 'tis a pouch!
Blast those landlubbers t' kingdom come!

effects.description:
Missile strength: +2% for artillery units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +4% for artillery units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +8% for artillery units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Get that useless powder monkey t' work!
I be the scourge o' the nine seas.
Being shot at whilst covered in a foul, sticky mess is no picnic.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Assuming you get it right and your shot doesn't turn to flowers on impact, these little extras tend to bring advantage.
"If all else fails, shoot it squarely and dive into the drink!"

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "More Powder!"

skillTree.localised_description: …literally, though they never miss.
…because once they're in the water, you want your targets to stay there… forever.
Keep your tools on you at all times - you never know when you'll need them.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "Cackle Fruit" and "Pyromaniac"

skillTree.localised_description: Death is always just a shot away.
"It's got a few secret ingredients. No, I won't tell you what they are, but the results will speak for themselves."
"Get more ammo up here, NOW!!!!!!!!"
"The recoil's a nightmare, but you can't deny the end result!"
A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.
Some beings just want to see the world burn.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: The smiths have already completed their order, the workers are in position and the masons are ready to begin.

effects.description:
Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: I can procure anything an agent might need for any mission.
My lord, we can save time and supplies if we make some slight modifications to this design.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -1% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -3% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 1% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: 2% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: 4% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: You will fetch ammunition, clean and repair weapons, and do anything else our marksmen require of you

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +3% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

Reload time reduction: +6% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

Reload time reduction: +10% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +1%
	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 200

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is Undead (does not rout, immune to terror, becomes unstable when Leadership is low).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."
Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(own characters in province)

Hero action success chance: +10%
	(own characters in province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +2 per turn
	(all units in army)

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A master indeed - to rival the Great Necromancer himself?

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -10% for all spellcasters
	(own characters in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)
